Name: Fight For It
About the game: Fight For It! is a turn-based, rogue-like adventure. Create an adventuring group and walk through random generated zones full of enemies , awesome encounter and lots of loot . Includes: • 8 Unique Character • 4 Maps • 20+ Upgrades • 60+ Enemies • 80+ Encounter • 100+ Items ... future updates will increase the content further. Features: • Roll lots of dice to test your skills • 5 different difficulties • Write a different story with every play • Dynamic enemy strength by your level & infinite game length for infinite runs! • Dynamic ability learning through usage, or upgrade your favorite abilities in the main menu to always have them ready! How To: • Create your new adventuring party of up to 3 character • Dive in your selected zone with unique encounter & enemies • Encounter random events, fight enemies until you reach the boss of the stage • Shop more items before diving deeper into the next stage
